# AccessibilityZoomGestureAction.Direction.zoomIn

**Case**

The gesture direction that represents zooming in.

## Declaration

```swift
case zoomIn
```

## Getting the direction

- **AccessibilityZoomGestureAction.Direction.zoomOut**: The gesture direction that represents zooming out.
